website_summaries.verdict: Two popular kids' toys in one – Play Doh and My Little Pony together in a play set that's both fun and stimulating.
pros: Stimulates children's creativity with everything needed to customize Rainbow Dash with Play Doh, including 6 cans and "salon" accessories
cons: Play Doh occasionally gets jammed in the extruder
Can be messy, but not difficult to clean up once kids are done playing

customer_reviews.title: Simple at first glance, but so much to play with
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty neat! There's an extruder in this pony's head, but the really nice part is that you can unlock the place you put the dough in so that you can clean it out. It's realllllly nice. There's lots of places to mold with, and you can build her wings and body decorations as well as using the spots for molding. There were some nicely-thought-out colors, and the cute scissors were handy, too. Lots of places to play on such a simple (at first glance) toy. Really good one.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Rue Tivoli

customer_reviews.title: hair part doesn’t stay latched
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 3 stars because my daughter does like it but the part at the top to make the hair with does not stay patched and is way to hard for a child to operate. I have to help hold it down so she can get the play doh to come out. I would not buy this again and if I had known it was going to be so difficult I would have returned it. Now it’s way to long ago that I purchased it to return...now I know 🤨
customer_reviews.author: andrea young

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 3 yr old granddaughter. She recieved a fair share of gifts but IMMEDIATLY wanted to play with this one. And play she did for the next 1 1/2 hours. Completely and thoroughly happy and excited with it. Her mom says it's still the toy she goes to the most often to play with. A good gift that's well made that makes a little one happy( as well as her grandmother) can't be beat
customer_reviews.author: joanna gemmell

customer_reviews.title: Only cute because it is Dash.
customer_reviews.text: The extruder part doesn't stay down on its own when pushing the playdoh through. I had to hold it every time while my niece used it.There was no way she would have been able to use the hair extruder on her own. Also I had to use enough pressure that my hands were sore quickly, so there is little chance she would have had the hand strength to do it either.
customer_reviews.author: S. Strus

customer_reviews.title: The play doh does dry out pretty fast, so after not playing you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this! The wings keep falling off when she puts pressure on the pony trying to squeeze the play doh out to produce the hair. And she always complains that the wing is broken when it falls off. I know it's meant to be taken off, but I'm gonna just crazy glue together. The play doh does dry out pretty fast, so after not playing you have to put the dough back together not leave in pieces cause it won't last too long after.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my niece, she loved it! The colors of play-doh that came with the product is enough to make beautiful creations. I was personally surprised with the many designs my niece came up with. The size is great enough for her and her playdate to play together. One plays with the hair the other child starts molding play-doh designs that are on the my little pony's body. Keeps them entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: paradox1296

customer_reviews.title: Play-Doh Pony
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy! The designs are cute and detailed. When playtime is finished, the dough releases easily for cleanup. We used a toothpick to get in out of the tiny places. Perfect rainy day activity for our 8-year-old. Would probably be fun for younger children, but they may not have the patience to fill in the many details. I don't think our girl would have gotten much use out of it before age 6, as she would not have been able to sit and concentrate long enough until that age.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 year old, it’s ok. They quality is well enough, she just wasn’t into it. She loves Play Doh and has a lot of their products, but this one she was like, eh. Putting the play doh in the wings and shapes on the side it looks messy and not cute and colorful like the box portrays.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but tough to operate for a kid
customer_reviews.text: The lock keeps opening when trying to push the clay through, so everything falls out of the mold. Need to have two people to operate. One holds down the mold, the other pushed the clay through
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, brings fun for kids & adults!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend’s grand daughter who loves my little pony. This allows her to make colourful “hair” styles. It’s super cute!! Hours of fun for kids & adults!
customer_reviews.author: DizzyG

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo loved Rainbow Dash and play doh so this was a no brainer. We have played with it a few times and its a neat piece. The play doh colors that came with it are appropriate. The part her mane gros from is a bit hard to open when it's time for clean up, but if it's like other sets ee have gets easier after a while. Great addition to our play doh collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Two Times

customer_reviews.title: 3.5YO Keeps Coming Back to This One
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3.5YO to play with at grandmas. Honestly, to me it doesn't look like anything special, but kiddo keeps coming back to it. It has held her interest for longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice and my niece was pleased
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and my niece was pleased, but it broke quickly and was difficult for a 4 yo to figure out. You seem to need to push doh on to the wings, which is messy and it doesn't stay put. My niece didn't care too much, but I wasn't too impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my niece!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure was the craz is over all these unicorns but my niece is obsessed and loved this addition to her play-doh set.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Beaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is incredibly fun to play with, but the latch enabling the play doe to go through to make the mane broke the second time we played with It. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F. Vermut

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for a little girl in my child's class at her birthday party. She super loved it. Only thing I had regards about is that it looked really difficult in some areas to get the Playdough out of the pony.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My toddler saw this on a you tube video and just had to have it! Fast delivery, a little overpriced, but what isn't now days! She enjoys playing with it still.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and the play dough stays on as hair on pony. Very good for my four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ladi D

customer_reviews.title: Ponies, Playdough, scissors!! of course the 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest granddaughter loves her ponies, carries them everywhere! She also loves her play dough, getting it everywhere. Throw in a pair of scissors and the ability to cut "hair" and you have a toy a 4 year old loves! I'm happy with it also, it's simple to use. Once we showed her how to use it, she was on her own! Easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall though she is pleased and likes filling in the wings with play-doh
customer_reviews.text: So the locking latch for the hair part is a little tricky for my 4 year old, and if the wings come off she needs help putting them back on. But she really likes it, even if it can be just a tad frustrating for her at times. Overall though she is pleased and likes filling in the wings with play-doh.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun Playdoh Set
customer_reviews.text: Its smaller than what I thought. The part where the playdoh comes out sometimes pops open when pressing down when making hair. It's annoying. Also, as the hair grows, it leaves little room to place more playdoh inside without squishing the hair. Wish other Characters were available besides Rainbow Dash.
customer_reviews.author: LaRita

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: All the parts come off, the playdo never actually stays or form shapes for the smaller ones & then playdo got stuck in the head & the locking piece broke & the part to get the playdo out broke too. Its crap.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Will make a brony out of anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I had originally got this for my 4 year old daughter but I ended up taking it for myself. I'm 31 and I've never had more fun with a kids toy than with this. I would recommend this for any brony and anyone 18 to 35 even if you don't like MLP you will falll in love with this and become a brony yourself. It made me one and I used to hate My Little Pony with a passion.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Daughter plays with this for hours
customer_reviews.text: Play doh and kids are a no brainer. My daughter plays with this for hours. Making all the molds and doing hair.
customer_reviews.author: iLL Gil 710

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like about Play dough?
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter will receive for Christmas. It’s packed good and she will love. I only wish the packs of play dough were a wee bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: drd

customer_reviews.title: Loved by all the kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and her friends get this out to play all of the time. It could be easier to use, I find it a little frustrating, but they don't seem to care or notice. I would buy it again, no question.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: The picture is just like it came
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old is pony obsessed. She saw this on one of her YouTube Kids videos and I knew I needed to get it! She played for hours with this. The picture is just like it came. I like that it came with a rainbow of Play-Doh colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of molds and the kids had fun mixing colors to make her hair
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a birthday present to a little girl. All the kids wanted to play with it at her birthday party and mine are asking for one of their own. It has a lot of molds and the kids had fun mixing colors to make her hair. The scissors were popular too!
customer_reviews.author: Emmers

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want rainbow hair
customer_reviews.text: must put the dough in a little at a time
customer_reviews.author: Lauraglass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been watching a YouTube video of some lady playing with this toy. Daughter is going to love it. Saving it for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. 4 year old LOVES her.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous hair.. very fun to play with.. Wings and tail detach for easier color filling.. Beautiful of course(its rainbow dash!) An awesome addition~ She loves to grow her hair into a long rainbow and trim it~ totally worth it((*-*))
customer_reviews.author: ddsue75

customer_reviews.title: the kids loved it but after 1 or 2 goes at it
customer_reviews.text: the kids loved it but after 1 or 2 goes at it, all the playdoh is mixed up into a mass of purple/grey. hard to keep the fun colours going. 3 and 4 yr old loved it though.
customer_reviews.author: Nat W

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy lots of sections to play with
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy lots of sections to play with. It should come with a small spatula to scrape the play doe out of the hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Sheya

customer_reviews.title: Hmm find another toy
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating to use for kids. very little play do fits in and hard to push the lever for the “hair” to grow. Compartment for playdo is small and often flips up. Great idea but execution poor
customer_reviews.author: Catch the moment

customer_reviews.title: but it's impossible to make them look good and not just like smushing playdough on
customer_reviews.text: It has holes in the pony to put playdough in as cutie marks, but it's impossible to make them look good and not just like smushing playdough on. The mane was fun for our 6 year old but eventually the part that pushes down the clay broke so we can't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. So may hours of fun. Great for kids any age. Boys and girls love it. well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: carrie baker

customer_reviews.title: Makes play doh fun again
customer_reviews.text: Nice little toy for kids, using pony to make shapes from play-doh is excellent idea for two reasons: 1. Kids find it more exciting 2. Parents/kids don't have clean up each and every piece (as is the case with regular playdoh set), you only have 1 pony to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday gift, the little girl loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Any combo of Play-Do and My Little Pony is a win/win for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Schoeppe

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy at a great price. It was larger than I expected. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toy for girls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for present. 3 year old friend of my son was extremely excited! Played it non stop for several days already. Very nice toy for girls!
customer_reviews.author: K Adams

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but...
customer_reviews.text: It's strange to me that the hair comes out in a similar spot the handle does. Sometimes it's difficult not to break the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Robison

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My nieces love this toy (ages 2, 3, 5). It kept them busy for a long time. I was worried that it would be difficult to clean, but the play doh came out quite easily. The rainbow mane looks really pretty! You WILL end up with a lot of brown play doh in the end, however.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Christmas donations! Cute sets!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, great deal at $5 bought some to donate to Christmas toys for tots type programs locally. Some little girls will get hours of play and I'm sure love the sets! Thanks to the seller for the price discount they were offered at!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, cute pony but the Playdoh doesn't really want to stay in the grooves, it tends to fall out . Wings are removable and fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy given as a gift - the birthday girl loved it & plays with it regularly. Birthday girl is a my little pony fan & enjoys spending time creating different hairstyles & cutie marks for her play doh pony
customer_reviews.author: Liloux

customer_reviews.title: Now the dolls don’t get hair cuts.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should. Placed a rug under it to catch any extra. No prom lens.
customer_reviews.author: bbennett842

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received one of these as a gift and loved it so much that I purchased another one for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Great play-doh game
customer_reviews.text: Great play-doh game, incorporating different aspects of stamps, molds, and ... pushing doh through things. (not sure what the word is for that) Really good sized, and tons of fun for little kids!
customer_reviews.author: switters

customer_reviews.title: Difficult for toddler but good for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Hard to press lever down to get hair for my toddler granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Tliving

customer_reviews.title: My Niece can't stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.text: Niece was using it Christmas morning and can't wait to get more Play-Doh to do it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: littleli7

customer_reviews.title: Eh its alright
customer_reviews.text: Its alright. My 3 yr old got bored with the pony pretty quickly but loved the scissors and playdoh. Prob would have been better off buying something else or just the playdoh with accesories
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old Granddaughter. She likes to play with her MLP figurines along with her playdoh. With this toy she gets to play with her two favorite things but I don't have to clean playdoh off of six or seven small MLP figures.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is three and just has so much fun squishing play doh in
customer_reviews.text: My daughter literally plays with this every day. She loves My Little Pony and loves play-doh. She is three and just has so much fun squishing play doh in, and cutting hair, and making shapes. It's worth the money. Though, if it is for a little one, only give them 1 canister of play-doh at a time. It turns gross brown real quick. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chasingthedog

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. My daughter (3 years old) loves MLP and she loves to play with Play-Doh so this was the perfect gift. It's cute and fun. She can operate and use all of it on her own. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: Super cute product
customer_reviews.text: Super cute product, my girls loved it. Listening to them fight over it wasn't as cute though. Should have bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Alli Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. No qualms or complaints
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Our 3.5 year old LOVES it. Good quality. No qualms or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletSwitchit

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived in great condition. My daughter loved all the different molds
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in great condition. My daughter loved all the different molds. My only criticism is that the included play-doh tubs are very small. Luckily, we had also purchased more tubs so it did not really matter to us.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: ... and four year old granddaughters each have one and love them. Has the usual issues of all other ...
customer_reviews.text: My three and four year old granddaughters each have one and love them. Has the usual issues of all other play doh products, but the girls have so much fun, the mess and cleanup are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Kid liked it because it's rainbow dash
customer_reviews.text: Kid liked it because it's rainbow dash, but I thought it was a pain to clean, tiny playdoh containers and doesn't feel like it'll last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is cute for a My Little Pony/Playdoh fan. Price was better than competitors. Reason I gave only 4 stars was bc it's hard to get all the Playdoh out of it and you end up with dried bits.
customer_reviews.author: ASConner

customer_reviews.title: ... toy and I must admit that this is my favorite play-doh toy we own
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo daughter loves this toy and I must admit that this is my favorite play-doh toy we own. The quality is excellent and my daughter enjoys "trimming" Rainbow Dash's hair as the color changes. Great product that you don't see out at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: GJM_BURGH

customer_reviews.title: Great little play doh toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's birthday when she turned 4. She loves it and I feel this will help her be creative when it comes to designing rainbow dash's wings!
customer_reviews.author: Sanch Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece loved this! Wouldn't put it down. Such a neat gift for any pony or playdo lover! The vibrant colored playdo could be meshed together to create such a fun rainbow!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the toy I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, she loves making the rainbow hair for her rainbow dash.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video with your child.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun but frustrating and kids move on. The play-doh gets stuck in the mane and hard to clean out of the wings and tail. Again, watch the video or you will not know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: The play-doh colors were very pretty and the pony comes clean when playtime is over
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Play-Doh Rainbow Dash style toy. The play-doh colors were very pretty and the pony comes clean when playtime is over.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun she had!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved the My Little Pony play dooh set. That was all she talked about wanting Santa to bring her. Thank you for making it possible.

customer_reviews.title: the ones that come with are small and if u have a young child like mine a lot ends up nasty

customer_reviews.title: This came just like it should
customer_reviews.text: This came just like it should! My son loves it. The only con about it is getting the play doh in the wings without mixing the colors. Great play doh kit!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Play-Doh My Little Pony Rainbow Dash Style Salon Playset
product_meta.description:
What’s more fun than a magical, fashionable pony? A pony you can “grow” hair for! This Rainbow Dash Style Salon playset includes a pony extruder that looks like Rainbow Dash and 6 colors of Play-Doh modeling compound. You can make a rainbow braid for her and cut it off with the scissors, and make all kinds of fun decorations for her! When you’ve got the Rainbow Dash Style Salon playset, the only limit to the creativity is your imagination! 

Play-Doh, My Little Pony and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
